estion "What is the area of the polygon formed by connecting the $x$- and $y$-intercepts of the graph of $y=f(x)$?", we need to:
Determine the function $f(x)$.
Calculate the $x$-intercepts (where $y=0$).
Calculate the $y$-intercept (where $x=0$).
Connect the intercepts to form the polygon and identify its vertices.
Calculate the area of the polygon formed by these intercepts.
